## Part-1 - pollutantmean Function

```{r}

```
```{r}
source("pollutantmean.R")
pollutantmean("specdata", "sulfate", 1:10)
```

```{r}

```
```{r}
pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 23)
```

## Part-2  - complete Function

```{r}
source("complete.R")
complete("specdata", 1)
```

```{r}
complete("specdata", c(2, 4, 8, 10, 12))
```

```{r}
complete("specdata", 30:25)
```

```{r}
complete("specdata", 3)
```
